author: rfeng
msg: Refactor the builder implementations into tuscany-builder module

author: dblevins
msg: Fix for OPENEJB-1049: Stateful session cache management issue
We now track a transaction object in the Instance which is checked to prevent access outside the transaction.

We also have some special logic that allows the client using the instance in the transaction to bend the rules and invoke the bean as it wishes (inside or outside the transaction it is controlling).  In this scenario the instance will still be considered in transaction stay locked to other threads.
